verses.roman:
'āge kaha'--prabhu-vākye upādhyāya kahila
raghupati upādhyāya namaskāra kaila

synonyms: āge kaha—please speak further; prabhu-vākye—on the request of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; upādhyāya—Raghupati Upādhyāya; kahila—said; raghupati upādhyāya—Raghupati Upādhyāya; namaskāra kaila—offered Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu obeisances.
translation: When Raghupati Upādhyāya was requested by the Lord to recite more, he immediately offered his respects to the Lord and granted His request.
